DataElement.preferredDefinition: Name of person who reviewed the radiotherapy object.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Approved; established by authority; given authoritative approval._A person with a responsibility for examining something to make sure that it is adequate, accurate, or correct._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:Approved; established by authority; given authoritative approval.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
Acceptance as satisfactory by an authoritative body; established by authority; given authoritative approval.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person with a responsibility for examining something to make sure that it is adequate, accurate, or correct.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: PN: A character string encoded using 5 component convention, each of 64 characters.  Components order is: Family name, Given Name, Middle Name, Prefix, Suffix.  "^" used to identify a null component. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Containing as much or as many as is possible or normal.:A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: Containing as much or as many as is possible or normal.

A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.
